    • ProductService

      public ProductService()

  • Method Details

    • addNewProduct

      public ProductEntity addNewProduct(ProductEntity product, org.springframework.web.multipart.MultipartFile[] files)
      Creates a new product in the system.
      Parameters:
      product - the product to be saved
      Returns:
      the saved product

    • getAllProducts

      public List<ProductEntity> getAllProducts()
      Retrieves all products stored in the database. This method fetches all products from the productDao repository. If no products are found, a warning message is logged.
      Returns:
      A List of ProductEntity objects representing all stored products.

    • getProductsBySearchKeyWithPagination

      public PageResponseDto<ProductEntity> getProductsBySearchKeyWithPagination(int page, int size, String searchKey)
      Retrieves a paginated and sorted list of products ordered by their name. This method fetches a paginated list of products from the database, ordered by the product name in ascending order. It uses the provided page number and page size to determine the pagination parameters.
      Parameters:
      page - The page number to retrieve, starting from 0.
      size - The number of products per page.
      Returns:
      A PageResponse object containing the list of products, total number of pages, total number of elements, page size, and the current page number.

    • getAllProductsOrderedByName

      public List<ProductEntity> getAllProductsOrderedByName()
      Retrieves a list of all products ordered by their name in ascending order. This method fetches all products from the database, ordered by the product name in ascending order.
      Returns:
      A list of all products sorted by their name.

    • deleteById

      public void deleteById(Integer productId)
      Deletes a product by its ID. This method checks if the product with the given productId exists in the database. If the product does not exist, it logs a warning and throws a ProductNotFoundException. Otherwise, it deletes the product and logs a confirmation message.
      Parameters:
      productId - The ID of the product to be deleted.
      Throws:
      ProductNotFoundException - if the product with the given ID does not exist.

    • getProductById

      public ProductEntity getProductById(Integer productId)
      Retrieves a product by its ID. This method attempts to find a product in the database using the provided productId. If the product is found, it is returned. Otherwise, a ProductNotFoundException is thrown.
      Parameters:
      productId - The ID of the product to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The ProductEntity associated with the given ID.
      Throws:
      ProductNotFoundException - if no product is found with the given ID.

    • updateProduct

      public void updateProduct(Integer id, ProductEntity product, List<org.springframework.web.multipart.MultipartFile> newImages, List<String> previewImages)
      Updates an existing product with the given details, including new images and image previews. This method retrieves the existing product by its ID, updates its attributes, handles the removal of preview images, adds new images if provided, and saves the updated product in the database.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the product to be updated.
      product - The updated product details.
      newImages - A list of new images to be added to the product (optional).
      previewImages - A list of existing image names to be removed from the product (optional).
      Throws:
      ProductNotFoundException - if no product is found with the given ID.
      ImageUploadException - if an error occurs while uploading new images.

    • getProductDetailsById

      public List<ProductEntity> getProductDetailsById(boolean isSingleProductCheckOut, Integer productId)
      Retrieves product details based on the checkout type.
      Parameters:
      isSingleProductCheckOut - If true, fetches a single product by its ID. Otherwise, retrieves all products in the user's cart.
      productId - The ID of the product to fetch (used only if isSingleProductCheckOut is true).
      Returns:
      A list of ProductEntity objects.
